page.title: 20A RISELEY PARTY(2)
page.content: A buffet was arranged - cold turkey, ham, beef, and sausage rolls accompanied by a selection of salads and pickles. The sweets were gateaux, cheese-cakes, fresh-fruit salad and trifle, followed by cheese and biscuits. White wine was available during the meal. Towards the end of the meal a celebration wine was distributed and, with a humorous speech, a cousin proposed the toast of Jill, who, in response, cut a special birthday cake and offered a piece to everyone. Dancing followed and at the stoke of midnight a group of girls gave Jill her 'bumps' - twenty one tosses into the air. Next day all her gifts were opened and each must be acknowledged by a letter of thanks or a visit to the donor.
